Book a room.dialogue:
Here you are, sir,
 As you may know, we've received some complaints from guests about strange occurrences in this specific room.
 We've done our best to address the concerns of our guests, but the strange events seem to persist. 
 We're hoping that you'll be able to shed some light on the matter.

Watch tv.dialogue:
You flipped through the channels, but as you stopped on one,
 you were greeted with a burst of static and a strange, haunting image. 
Is it a glitch in the signal?
 As you continue to watch, you realized that the image was not going away.
 It was like something was trying to reach out to you from the other side.

Enter Secret Room.dialogue:
As you entered the dimly lit room, you cautiously reach for your flashlight, 
clicking it on to illuminate the surroundings.  
 The beam of light danced across the room, 
revealing peeling wallpaper, dusty old furniture and an overall creepy atmosphere. 
 You took a deep breath and slowly scanned the room, alert for any signs of danger.

After looking up Jeff Smith in our database it turns out he has a warrant for his arrest. 
Jeff has been linked to multiple crimes in the past and is currently staying at the hotel
